values: So I think I am kind of leaning toward an option but I would appreciate any opinions. My question is, which college i should go to next year. Strait to Cal Poly San Luis Obispo or do a 1-year transfer to USC?

Thank you to everyone who made prom so special and amazing, I had so much fun. Special thanks for chels for making picture and after party arrangements, I had a blast! And thank you sweetie for being the best prom date in the world! <3

I have not updated in a long time, but I still keep up with everyone's live journals and myspaces. I guess i just give a quik recap of life. My and Stephy have been dating for a little over 15 months now, and I love her more than ever. She is the most beautiful and wonderful woman in the world and hopefully the woman of my life. Off to college next year though, lol but not very far. Somehow I did'nt get into any colleges so I will be at Moorpark (by the way, who is all going there next year?). Besides that, not much but give me a call if you ever want to hang out...404-6206...

ooo and supposedly my new name is Mikey Mazorella (i dont know if i spelled that right but like the Moazorella- like the cheese)

WOOT... I got a 3 on AP Physics.
Summer has been going great, i just hang out with Stephanie every day, and yeah its a ton of fun. (couldnt be better...i love it)

Today was ok considering it was school.
Went swimming after school that was fun.
Boy Scouts was pretty lame.
But the worst part was part of the aggrement I made with Stephani'es Parents when i asked if I could go out with her is I would have to take HER and their dog for a walk. And I always try to keep my promises, but anyways the dog was pretty good but man...Stephanie was such a pain, stopping to pick the flowers, look at license plates (I'm definately looking for a new walker, she is just to much work).

I still love her though...like no other, I mean she is the most amazingly beautiful person in the world, not to mention the sweetest and most caring. <333

So today (APRIL 3) is my birthday...yay for 17. anyways... steph was over till 1:30 and i cant think of starting off a birthday any better then sitting next to the most beautiful person in the whole world.. My parents moved our living room furniture into our backyard..so me ands steph just laid out there under the blanket with the heaters on watching T.V and it was really really nice. Its late now, and i think im going to bed.. but everyone give me a call today cause my parents said i could have people over to hang out...404-6206. <3

That was by far the best Easter I have ever had. It worked out so perfectly. I meet Stephanie at 9:00 mass and then she came to brunch with us where we met up with my cousins (my moms side). Brunch was really good, at Applebeas, lol... stephanies pancakes were pregnant. The brunch was alot of fun, everyone laughed really hard, then we got home and withing 5 minutes of being home we left for the horse races with stephy's family. I had a blast. Mr. Pitman bet for me and i had so much fun, i ended up with 10 more dollars then i started with, so i was pretty proud. Anyways i got to meet alot of steph's family there so that was nice and it was really cool to look at all the horses and then bet on them. As soon as we got back we walked to my house just in time to make dinner with my othere cousins (my dads side). Dinner was pretty good, but after i took all the kids to go get ice cream cause thats what i gave up for lent (and Dr. Pepper) and it sounded really good. (lol.....i got a tripe scoop...yummm) When we got back we all sat down and played double deck hearts. Me and steph played on a team cause she didnt understand the game but by the end of the night she was dominating. We ended up getting second place. :) Anyways...i havent laughed so hard in sooooooo long... it was really funny, the whole time we were playing cards was like one big laugh. Everyone left around 10:30 and then me and steph just layed down and talked and rested. Totally the best Easter Sunday EVER, so much fun. Thank you steph...... your the best, i love you. <3

I dont know how she does it...but somehow she makes every night we spend together better then the last.
<333

Another amazingly terrific, blown away, out of this world night with stephy...hang out all day, waatch big fish, wood ranch, hitch, blockbluster, starbucks, then chill with chels, ashley, chelsea, cristyn, and austin.

Went to go see Hitch last night, but the person in front of us bought the last ticket, so we chilled at my house. But first me and steph had to go on a two hour long adventure..it was pretty crazy and you could easily say i was finally happy just to lay down, watch the movie, and lay with the person i care most about. Anyways, it was pretty fun, it was me, Stephy, Cristyn, Chrisee, Chelsea, and Austinometry (ooops...i mean Austin). We watched Without A Paddle and it was pretty good, i think it is better if you have been camping, especially the bear scenes and stuff. Well i think we might go and try watching Hitch today so give me a ring if your intersted.

Went to go see Hitch last night, but the person in front of us bought the last ticket, so we chilled at my house. But first me and steph had to go on a two hour long adventure..it was pretty crazy and you could easily say i was finally happy just to lay down, watch the movie, and lay with the person i care most about. Anyways, it was pretty fun, it was me, Stephy, Cristyn, Chrisee, Chelsea, and Austinometry (ooops...i mean Austin). We watched Without A Paddle and it was pretty good, i think it is better if you have been camping, especially the bear scenes and stuff. Well i think we might go and try watching Hitch today so give me a ring if your intersted.
Were meeting at Mavericks to watch Hitch (the 7:40 show) anyone reading this it would be great to see ya there..:)

Wow..i just spent 15 minutes reading throuhg LJ's...kinda forgot about it (yay...my CD is done...and it has "We Didn't Start the Fire" on it...lol). Anyways life has been absolutely amazing. The last 2 months of my life have been more then i could have ever asked for and I'm so thankful (thank you stephy). Valentines Day (which is celebrated on the 15th not the 14th was really nice...we went to Baudaccos and then gave each other pictures...(great minds do think alike phinie). OMG....its like 11:30...time for bed
COMMENT PLEASE
Mikey<3Stephy

So i miss Stephanie so much..everything is lonely without her....but she gets back tomorrow...ya
*wow...my cousin just sniffed bottled water through her nose..lol..know she is complaining it hurts...lol*
chels is coming to pick me up in 15 minutes to run errands with her
Mikey<3333Phiney forever

Umm...dont know what to update about really
Really enjoying life...Stephanie is the best girlfriend in the whole wide world. She isnt here all weekend though, cause seh is in Arizone for her aunts wedding, which makes me sad. She wont be here Monday, but at least she will be here for OUR Valentines Day..tuesday the 15th. lololol.. Anyways, comment cause im bored and its late

Miss ya steph...<333

This weekend was nice
1)dinner for my grandmas birthday
2)boat show with my dad (ask me about what i got...dad splurged)
3)sisters alumni game
4)hanged out with steph, cristyn, and taylor
5)went to Mish's breakfast thing and it was really good
6)got to hang out with steph all day...was uber good...i really needed it too
7)watched white castle while steph napped on me
8)super bowl up the street..didnt win anything..and realized how much i suck at basketball
9)now im at home and having some major stephanie withdrawls...there just isnt enough time in a day to hang out with her

Wow...seems everysingle person is doing this...guess i dont wont to be left out


 
[01] Reply with your name and I will write something about you.
[02] I will then tell you what song/BAND reminds me of you.
[03] Next, I will tell you who you remind me of, celebrity/animated or otherwise.
[04] Last, I will try to name a single word that best describes you.
[05] Put this in your journal.
So the last month has been the best time of my life. Tonight at twelve me and steph have gone out for a month and it has been incredible... Thank You Stephanie... <3333 forever

Well Friday was pretty good. Didnt need to worry about my spanish final and me and steph dominated the chem final (congrats Steph on being the best in class). After school i got to spend some time with steph before i headed out to Sports Challea (spelled that wrong) to get ski equipment. Right after that we drove to mammoth, which seemed like quite all long drive, although it was cool to get to play with my dads 10 million watt candle powered uber flashlight. Anyways the skiing up there was incredibe..although today even though it was warm on pretty much the whole mountain..near the top it was about 10 degrees and with wind gust from 45 to 55 it dropped teh temperatre to below negative 40 degrees..(burrrrr..and it wasnt the cold that was teh bad part..it was the fliing ice chunks that hit u in the face) so we only skiied off the top twice today. Anyways..good weekend.. really miss Stephanie though :(

Life is good
Life is grand
Life is beautiufl
Stephanie is incredible
And now its dinner time
 <333 Phinie

Yesterday was sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo much fun. Jen, Krista, Stephanie, and I spent the whole day at Disneyland. It was reallllllyyyyyyyyy nice, and I had a blast. My favorite part was spending time with Steph, but it was REALLLYYYY REALLYYYY COOL to get to see the ELECTRICAL LIGHT PARADE. *I want to be the dancer dude inside that big toad thingy,,, soooooo cool.

And I thought Dreams only came true in Fairy-Tales
  Mikey <3 Steph

Today I think was the best day of my life
I dont think i have ever been so happy before
My feelings for Stephanie are out of this world and
  she means everything to me
And lastly my mom sent in her Survivor application video today
  (can you imagine my mom on Survivor..holy shit..lol)

Good Night Everyone..thank you all for being my friends
   P.S. DAMN...LIFE IS GOOD

I <3333 Phinie

So Steph makes me happier then I think I've ever been.. Just wanted to let u guys know
Mikey <3333 Phinie

Umm.. Just feel like updating..
not much going on
Worked on math homework with Cristyn
(understand it a little bit more)
got to spend time with Phinie...yay
now im bored...should be studying for math
going to starbucs tomorrow around 5 to study :(

P.S. Phinie looks hot in pig tails

With exception of my Physics test my Friday was awesome. After school me and Phini hanged out and watched embarrasing home videos of each other, it was alot of fun. Then a couple people came over and we went in the spa (the pool was really cold :#). Then we just all chilled in Steph's lving room and started watching Troy. After a little people started leaving and it ended up just being me and Steph and it was UBER NICE. It was raining outside and all peaceful and we just sat there and cuddled... so relaxing

Steph... U make me sooo happy <33333

I feel like updating so yeah..
   Just chilling, little bored, got to 
   go see Stepahnie ride Eppy and that was cool.
Peace Out...
School sucked but spending time with Steph afterward rocked <33

So this is horrible. First of all I had the best Winter Break EVER.. i had such a great time. With that said im so freiken depressed about going back to school. I mean i walked in after hanging out at Chelsea's and my house is dead quite. My dad is at his computer typing away doing work, the shower is going, all of our Christmas decorations have dissapeared, the kitchen is clean, no fire, TV going and no one watching, you could smell school in the air, then I looked at the clock and realized i just walked in at frieken 7:00 (OMG). Anyways..im uber depressed..uber sad..uber mad..and just not excited about this whole school thing.

Well..lets recap on 2004.. Overall it went really well.
    New friends to hang out with (which are all really cool)
    Passing two AP tests
    Awesome classes for this year
    And meeting the most beautiful and heartwarming person in my life (<3333 steph)

   -O.K. that is really upsetting.. i cant remember anything from this year..whatever ill have to add stuff later to it as comes to me
         P.S. Thank you Stephanie.. tonight my blessings, prayers, (lol..shotting stars and 11:11 wishes) all came true. You mean so much to me... <333

I'm leaving for the doctors in about 15 minutes and im really excited. My knee has been bothering me for about a year and hopefully they can fix it because Pacific Care couldn't. I'm also getting my eyes checked, i think, which sucks, but i think i might need glasses... my vision is going :(   Anyways feel free to give me a call...ill probably be home by the time everyone is awake anyways. Later :)

These are the Top Ten signs that you are in love!
10. Time is an eternity when you're without them
9. Time stops when you're with them
8. The thought of them makes you shiver
7. The sound of them makes you smile
6. When seeing them, you can't see anything else
5. You start to listen to sappy love songs
4. You actually enjoy sappy love songs
3. The smell of them makes you see fireworks
2. You find yourself smiling constantly
1. You'd do anything, even die for them

Now, make a wish!

It's Christmas Eve and Im bored..that is disgusting..someone please call and we can just chat..

Went snowboarding yesterday with amanda, aaron, chelsea, smak, someone i didnt know, and stephanie. It was a blast! We woke up really early (4:30) and was on the rode by 5:00 (in the morning..ahh). Anyways i had never been to either snow summit or big bear and it was awesome. I really enjoyed big bear cause the runs werent to difficult so me and steph could stay together yet i could do jumps the whole way down. It was really nice cause practically the whole mountain was a freestyle park. For lunch, me and steph had a hot dog and gatorade, man it was gooooood. At 1 we left to snow summit but took the wrong tram so we got to ride on this cow cart truck thingy (was an EXPERIENCE). Anyways after only two runs me and steph called it quiets and got some hot chocolate with ALOT of whip cream. Although, i did take one finall run wiht aaron and chelsea. It was rad, we raced from the top of the mountain to the bottem, it was so cool. We must have been going like 40 i think i turned like 10 times the whole way down (first time i ever bobmend a double black diamond) It probably would have been a tie but aaron nailed some kid and did some crazy flips in the air before smacking the ground. All in all i had a great time

P.S. Thanks Mr.s Levy, Amanda, and Chelsea for driving us... :)

I'm so excited.
Skiing all day tomorrow with Stephanie.
Que nos la chingala!
That last few days of winter break have been Awesome. I have no plans for today so if anyone is doing anything, give me a call. :)

ONE day left till chistmas break...yaaa..  I'm so excited, and this year its awesome for a couple reasons: 1) started early (no homework today)     2) no homework all chistmas break (first time in like 6 years)    3) i have the best freinds to spend it with    4)there is someone special out there to spend time with    5) and the icing on the cake..right now im listening to "Thre Redneck Reindeer", "Yellow Snow", and "The Twelve Pains of Christmas".     ANYWAYS..right now im bored and ive called everyone..no one is home... i feel so lonely.. Someone call...anytime.

So today i had to wake up early to do our stupid histroy project (which is pointless cause i have an automatic A in the class). Anyways, after a cup of coffee i was fine. School went ok, my back and butt hurt alot in those super uncomfortable chairs. OMG, my math class gets more boring every day, its absolutely terrible, i cant concentrate at all in taht class. Anyways, spanish class stank (wierd), but chem class rocked. We got to do this krazy kool lab were we filled ballons with Hydrogen (2) gas and then got to blow them up (it was funny watching Stephanie jump every single time..lol). So after school I didn't feel like doing HW so i called Stephanie and we made a pumpkin pie (way cool). Then me, chels, jason, and steph all went to the mall for holiday shooping, event thought the only person i got something for was Chelsea. It was nice though, we went to Johnny Rockets and had some shakes and food, tis good. Anyways, i cant believe chelsea bought our super corny lie about what i did instead of getting her her Chanukah present (hope i spelled that right). It was so great..by the way.. jason u took that one far). Then i came home and realized that pumpkin pie tastes ALOT better if u let it cool.. so i brought some over to Stephanie's along with some eggnog (jeeeeezzz, u haven't tried so much). THEN, OMG, i went to chelsea's to give her her presnet and her mom, a super duper physical therapist, worked on my back, and it felt SOOOOOOOOOOO GOOOOOD :). Thanks Mr.s Eakins. Anyways, now i sit here and REALLY dont want to do my HW...........  dont think i am.
